alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 12 at 11:19PM AKST until December 13 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Blowing snow will reduce visibility to one quarter mile or less at times in winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst conditions are occurring across Barter Island.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
